full_sentence: I am Sum Wan from Hong Kong
traditional_chinese: 我是來自香港的Sum Wan。

full_sentence: You can call me Timothy
traditional_chinese: 你可以叫我Timothy。

clause_01: Hong Kong since I was born
full_sentence: I have been living in Hong Kong since I was born
traditional_chinese: 我從出生以來一直住在香港。

full_sentence: I had working experience before I started studying
traditional_chinese: 在我開始學習之前，我有工作經驗。

clause_01: project management, coding, and project design architecture
full_sentence: I am skilled in project management, coding, and project design architecture
traditional_chinese: 我擅長專案管理、編碼和專案設計架構。

full_sentence: I like to bring enthusiasm and adaptability to my work
traditional_chinese: 我喜歡將熱情和適應能力帶到我的工作中。

full_sentence: I have the confidence to contain creativity and initiative
traditional_chinese: 我有自信能夠包容創造力和主動性。

full_sentence: There are many things to gain from an internship
traditional_chinese: 從實習中可以獲得許多收穫。

full_sentence: I want to learn a variety of areas in the field of AI
traditional_chinese: 我想要在人工智慧領域學習各種不同的領域。

clause_01: in a specific field of AI
full_sentence: I hope to become an IT expert in a specific field of AI
traditional_chinese: 我希望成為人工智慧特定領域的資訊科技專家。

full_sentence: I have gained great programming skill from college education
traditional_chinese: 我從大學教育中獲得了很棒的程式設計技能。

clause_01: using Asp.net, C#, C++, Python, SQL, and Javascript
full_sentence: When I was studying I gained experience in using Asp.net, C#, C++, Python, SQL, and Javascript
traditional_chinese: 當我在學習時，我獲得了使用Asp.net、C#、C++、Python、SQL和Javascript的經驗。

full_sentence: I set a high standard for myself
traditional_chinese: 我對自己設立了很高的標準。

full_sentence: One day a customer reported a performance issue in our web application
traditional_chinese: 有一天，一位顧客向我們報告了我們的網絡應用程式的性能問題。

full_sentence: My boss adjusted my schedule to help the company
traditional_chinese: 我的老闆調整了我的工作時間表，以幫助公司。

preposition_02: a dispensing system and big data
full_sentence: I worked on a dispensing system and big data
traditional_chinese: 我曾經參與一個分配系統和大數據的工作。

full_sentence: I had to master the art of prioritizing to prioritizing
traditional_chinese: 我必須掌握優先排序的藝術，以便進行優先排序。

full_sentence: I created some web service to reduce that workload API
traditional_chinese: 我創建了一些網路服務來減輕那個工作負擔的API。

full_sentence: My SA suggested I use XML format
traditional_chinese: 我的SA建議我使用XML格式。

full_sentence: I preferred to use JSON format rather than XML
traditional_chinese: 我更喜歡使用JSON格式而不是XML。

full_sentence: I feel pressure like I work well
traditional_chinese: 我感到壓力，就像我工作得很好一樣。

full_sentence: For me drives me to work harder
traditional_chinese: 對我來說，這驅使我更努力工作。

full_sentence: I researched the use of artificial intelligence during COVID-19
traditional_chinese: 我研究了在COVID-19期間使用人工智慧的情況。

full_sentence: My goal was to get a score of 80 or more
traditional_chinese: 我的目標是獲得80分或以上。

full_sentence: Time management is important for IT project today
traditional_chinese: 今天對於IT專案來說，時間管理非常重要。

full_sentence: I analyzed the stock market during COVID-19
traditional_chinese: 我在COVID-19期間分析了股市。

full_sentence: I used regression on historical data
traditional_chinese: 我在歷史數據上使用了回歸分析。

full_sentence: The project aims to predict future stock prices with regression and LSTM
traditional_chinese: 這個專案旨在使用回歸和LSTM來預測未來的股票價格。

full_sentence: There is no feature representing the target variable
traditional_chinese: 目標變數沒有任何特徵。

full_sentence: the perception model is mixed together the predictions of Ridge and LSTM
traditional_chinese: 這個知覺模型將Ridge和LSTM的預測混合在一起。

full_sentence: I finished calculating the historical stock price daily return
traditional_chinese: 我已經完成計算歷史股價的每日回報。

full_sentence: Finally I got a mark of 92
traditional_chinese: 最後我得到了92分。

full_sentence: It is a bit hard to deal with these raw data
traditional_chinese: 處理這些原始數據有點困難。

clause_01: effective averaging for improving the accuracy
full_sentence: I analyzed a new approach to achieve effective averaging for improving the accuracy
traditional_chinese: 我分析了一種新方法，以實現有效的平均化，以提高準確性。

full_sentence: For me pressure drives me to be more focused
traditional_chinese: 對我來說，壓力驅使我更加專注。

full_sentence: I have never been one to leave things until the last minute
traditional_chinese: 我從來不會把事情拖到最後一刻。

full_sentence: I utilized LSTM model to predict stock prices
traditional_chinese: 我使用LSTM模型來預測股票價格。

full_sentence: There was no feature representing the target variable
traditional_chinese: 沒有任何特徵代表目標變數。

full_sentence: After building the perception model mixed Ridge and LSTM predictions After building the perception model
traditional_chinese: 在建立感知模型之後，混合了Ridge和LSTM的預測。在建立感知模型之後。

full_sentence: I achieved a score of 92
traditional_chinese: 我得到了92分的成績。

full_sentence: I created web service API to access functions of the existing site
traditional_chinese: 我創建了網絡服務API，以訪問現有網站的功能。

full_sentence: If it meant extra hours I put them in
traditional_chinese: 如果這意味著需要加班，我會願意加入。

full_sentence: I never leave things to the last minute
traditional_chinese: 我從不把事情拖到最後一刻。

full_sentence: I stepped up when others couldn't attend
traditional_chinese: 當其他人無法參加時，我挺身而出。

full_sentence: I prefer JSON format but I considered XML
traditional_chinese: 我更喜歡JSON格式，但我也考慮過XML。

full_sentence: I introduced a new approach To improve accuracy
traditional_chinese: 我引入了一種新的方法來提高準確性。
